name: Tiramisu
description: A traditional Italian dessert made with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and a dusting of cocoa powder.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Crispy breaded mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara dipping sauce.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with steamed vegetables and

name: Caprese Salad
description: Sliced tomatoes and fresh mozzarella, topped with basil leaves, drizzled with balsamic reduction, and sprinkled with sea salt.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh Romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing

name: Vegetarian Stir Fry
description: A medley of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy-ginger sauce, served with jasmine rice.

name: Margarita Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil

name: Hotdogs
description: Hot Pizza

name: Berry Fruit Tart
description: A crisp pastry crust filled with creamy custard and topped with a variety of fresh, seasonal berries like strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A warm, gooey chocolate cake with a molten center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and drizzled with chocolate syrup.

name: Classic Cheesecake
description: A rich and creamy cheesecake on a graham cracker crust, topped with a smooth berry compote and whipped cream.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Grilled chicken served with creamy Alfredo pasta

name: Gajar Ka Halwa
description: A traditional Indian dessert of grated carrots slow-cooked in milk and sugar, garnished with nuts.

name: Beef Pulao
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender beef pieces and a blend of spices, creating a flavorful one-pot meal.

name: Masala Chai
description: Spiced Indian tea brewed with milk and a signature blend of warming spices like cardamom, cinnamon, and ginger.

name: Kulfi
description: A traditional frozen dessert, denser and creamier than ice cream, available in flavors like mango or pistachio.

name: Water Melon Juice
description: A naturally sweet and hydrating juice made from fresh watermelon, perfect for summer

name: Samosas
description: Crispy, deep-fried pastry pockets filled with a spicy mix of potatoes, peas, and sometimes meat.

name: Chicken Corn Soup
description: A comforting soup featuring tender chicken pieces and sweet corn in a flavorful broth, ideal for rainy days.

name: Quinoa & Avocado Salad
description: A healthy combination of quinoa, creamy avocado, chickpeas, and fresh veggies, tossed in a light lemon vinaigrette

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo pasta topped with tender grilled chicken and Parmesan cheese.

name: Beef Steak
description: Juicy, tender steak cooked to your preference, served with mashed potatoes and gravy.

name: Stuffed Jalapeños
description: Jalapeños stuffed with cream cheese, coated in breadcrumbs, and deep-fried to perfection.

name: Pakoras
description: A variety of vegetables dipped in a seasoned gram flour batter and deep-fried to golden perfection.

name: Garlic Breadsticks
description: Warm breadsticks topped with garlic butter and herbs, served with marinara sauce.

name: Nihari
description: A rich, slow-cooked beef or lamb stew served for breakfast or dinner, featuring deep, spiced flavors.

name: Haleem
description: A slow-cooked, hearty stew made with wheat, barley, lentils, and tender meat, simmered with traditional spices.

name: Cucumber Raita
description: A cooling yogurt-based side dish mixed with crisp cucumber and a touch of spices.

name: Mango Lassi
description: A sweet, creamy mango-flavored yogurt drink that’s refreshing on a hot summer day.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A warm, creamy beverage made with rich cocoa and milk, perfect for cozying up in the rain.

name: Fruit Chat
description: A vibrant mix of seasonal fruits tossed with a hint of chaat masala for a tangy, refreshing snack.

name: Seekh Kebab
description: Skewered, spiced minced meat grilled to perfection, offering a burst of flavor in every bite.

name: Grilled Corn
description: Sweet corn on the cob grilled with a light butter and herb seasoning, a perfect side or snack.

name: Veggie Skewers
description: A medley of marinated vegetables, grilled on skewers for a healthy, flavorful treat.

name: Greek Salad
description: A vibrant mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, Kalamata olives, red onions, and feta cheese, drizzled with olive oil and oregano dressing.

name: BBQ Chicken
description: Juicy chicken marinated in a tangy barbecue sauce and grilled to create a smoky, savory dish.

name: Fish Tikka
description: Tender pieces of fish marinated in a blend of spices and yogurt, then grilled to a delicious finish.
